cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause network interface configuration errors and AMF connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RA response window to 100 exceeds the valid range (1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80), leading to improper RACH procedure handling and UE access failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RA 回應視窗設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80)，導致 RACH 程序處理不當，並造成 UE 接入失敗。
